name: An Otter War
description:
An Otter War is a single-player military strategy game in which the player deploys Otter's troops to the battlefield to destroy zombie otter burrows. The player must decide which type and how many units will guide the battle. To win, the player has to destroy the enemy base.

Stylized in 3D Hand Painted art, the otters will face different biomes in which violent but cute creatures have developed intelligence and conscience.

Controls

Swipe to move screen

Touch icons to create units
